conclusion: Initial conditions: truck and bus start from rest at t=0, initial distance is 30 meters.
V-t graphs show linear lines indicating constant deceleration for both vehicles.
Deceleration rate for truck calculated as 1.33 m/s².
Deceleration rate for bus calculated as 1.5 m/s².
Distance traveled by truck at t=10s is approximately 333.33 meters.
Distance traveled by bus at t=10s is 225 meters.
Relative distance between truck and bus at t=10s is 108.33 meters.
Maximum distance occurs when bus has traveled full distance and truck part of its distance.
Truck's distance at t=20s is 266.67 meters.
Relative distance at t=20s is 41.67 meters.
Maximum distance between the vehicles is approximately 41.67 meters.
